Fest contacts.Name: Clapham Common
Fest contacts.Ambiance: Chilled out park. Changes to outdoor club vibe for SW4 festival
Fest contacts.Disabled facilities: The majority of the path(s) are wide enough for wheelchair users. There are accessible toilet facilities and bench seats situated along the paths for people to rest. https://www.accessable.co.uk/venues/clapham-common
Fest contacts.Opening hours: Clapham Common is open 24 hours a day.
Fest contacts.Parking: Parking is a nightmare. Most of the streets are resident permits only. You can park in these zones on Sundays all other days best bet is to use the tube.
